content:
cfallin opened PR #4036 from cranelift-meeting-20220418 to main:

The first item is inspired by my waiting and rebasing at each step along a chain of pending PRs, each of which has some changes that require rebuilding ISLE generated code. I wonder if we should re-discuss the tradeoffs here now that we've gathered some real-world experience.

Second item is an open prompt to discuss some ideas that came from discussion with @abrown and later @fitzgen and @sunfishcode ; ways to make expressing certain patterns in ISLE a bit easier (in a way that is fully backward-compatible).

Third item is to create some space to discuss the continued ISLE migration progress and get a more concrete picture on what's left to do and what resourcing we have around that.

Hopefully we'll have enough time to get some useful info/feedback on all of these!
